events.message: I just got into a car accident yesterday evening and need to file a claim for the damages sustained.
The claim has been categorised under Auto Accident following the report of a vehicle collision on 2024-04-30.
An agent has been assigned to manage your vehicle accident claim and will contact you shortly for further details.
Your auto accident claim has been received and is now officially acknowledged by the insurance company.
Please submit your car registration, police report, and photos of the collision damage to continue processing your claim.
All requested documents including the accident report and photos have been submitted successfully by the claimant.
The investigation for the car collision claim has officially started and the assessor has been assigned to evaluate damage.
Investigation concluded with confirmation of liability for damages sustained during the auto accident on April 30.
A settlement amount has been proposed based on the damage assessment report and insurance policy coverage limits.
The claimant responded positively regarding the fairness of the proposed settlement for the car accident claim.
Your auto accident claim has been approved for the full amount proposed in the settlement offer.
Payment for the approved settlement amount has been processed and issued to your designated bank account.
The auto accident claim case has been closed successfully following settlement and payment completion.
The related documents and records for this vehicle collision claim have been archived for future reference.
